com.communote.common.virusscan.impl

Class ClamAVScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.common.virusscan.impl.ClamAVScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirusScanner

    public class ClamAVScanner
extends Object
implements VirusScanner
    This class represents an anti virus scanner. The input stream or byte content will be scanned by a clamav daemon(TCP/IP).
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_PROP

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClamAVScanner()
      This constructor is necessary for reflection else you will get an ClassNotFoundException by the VirusScannerFactory

      • scan

        public InputStream scan(InputStream stream)
                 throws VirusScannerException,
                        VirusFoundException
        Scan an input stream for virus.
        Specified by:
        scan in interface VirusScanner
        Parameters:
        stream - Data stream
        Returns:
        Return true if a virus was detected else false, when no virus was detected
        Throws:
        VirusScannerException - This Exception encapsulate any exception
        VirusFoundException - This only thrown when a virus was found
